resources.string: USB connected, check to share USB-PC internet
"USB PC Internet access function is turned on"
Can\'t share internet when USB storage is in use

1.Open the Windows PC network.

2.On the network you want to share right click and select Properties.

3.Click Advanced Options, select 'Allow other network users to share Internet this computer to connect to ' (If your home network option appears, select the new USB network connection).
"When bluetooth is enabled or is turning on, the softap can not work, if you want to use the softap, please make sure that the bluetooth is disabled."
"Portable Wi-Fi hotspot needs mobile data connect, may produce additional costs."
"When softap is enabled or turning on, the bluetooth cannot work, if you want to use the bluetooth, please make sure that the softap is disabled."
It will take at most 1 minute to obtain GPS fix. Besides, GPS may fail to provide time due to weak environmental signal.\n\nAre you sure to use GPS provided time?

To use GPS provided time, you must enable GPS first. It then take at most 1 minute to obtain GPS fix. Besides, GPS may fail to provide time due to weak environmental signal. \n\nAre you sure to enable GPS now and wait for GPS provided time?
Use charge only mode when USB connected
Whether to enable agps in different network environment.
Clicking for restore the default settings.
Using AGPS will generate international roaming fees if you selected All networks in AGPS enable option, when your phone is international roaming.
